style.name: wxWRAPSIZER_DEFAULT_FLAGS
style.description: Equivalent to a combination of wxEXTEND_LAST_ON_EACH_LINE and wxREMOVE_LEADING_SPACES.

style.name: wxEXTEND_LAST_ON_EACH_LINE
style.description: Will cause the last item on each line to use any remaining space on that line.

style.name: wxREMOVE_LEADING_SPACES
style.description: Removes any spacer elements from the beginning of a row.
